text: Indira Gandhi Rashtriya Manav Sangrahalaya (IGRMS) or National Museum of Humankind or Museum of Man is an anthropology museum located in Bhopal, India. ==Collections== Things that are in the permanent collection: Khambana Kao Phaba (painting). ==Other websites== * Official website * Images of Rashtriya Manav Sangrahalaya Category:Museums in India
title: Indira Gandhi Rashtriya Manav Sangrahalaya
